meanings.definition: A simplified or less demanding version of something
meanings.sent1: The lite version of the game is easier to play.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the lite version of the software for my computer.
meanings.sent3: The lite manual made assembling the furniture a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was a lite version of the actual process.
meanings.sent5: The lite model of the car had fewer features but was more affordable.

meanings.definition: A type of beer with lower alcohol content
meanings.sent1: He chose to drink lite beer at the party.
meanings.sent2: The store sells lite beer for those who prefer a milder taste.
meanings.sent3: The lite beer was so light that it felt like drinking water.
meanings.sent4: After a long day, a cold lite beer was a refreshing treat.
meanings.sent5: The lite beer was perfect for a casual evening with friends.

meanings.definition: A type of food or drink that is lower in calories or fat
meanings.sent1: She ordered a lite salad for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The lite yogurt is a healthier snack option.
meanings.sent3: Eating lite ice cream felt like a guilt-free indulgence.
meanings.sent4: The lite smoothie was a delicious way to start the day.
meanings.sent5: Choosing lite dressing for the salad helped her stay on track with her diet.
